page.description: A framework for a mobile application with a hierarchical split-view Menu for navigating the app.
page.discussion: This template can be used to create a mobile application with a heirarchical split-view menu. A hierarchical split-view menu is a menu with sub-menus for some of the choices. The menu is displayed on the left-hand side of the app - if enough space is available. The menu is collapsed and a button can be clicked to display the menu if there is not enough space to display the menu and the work area. The menu uses Font-Awesome CSS Icon fonts.
